page.title: 12WALPOLE PARK
page.content: Gosport Borough Council want to develop the Town Centre. This could mean that part of{Walpole Park}is built on. Over 80% of the children in Newtown School use the park and we are worried, so are many of our parents and friends. We asked Mrs Heather Sinclair what she felt about the Council's proposed developments. Question _{Why do you go to the park? 'I go to enjoy an outing with my children or as a welcome interlude between shopping and travelling home. I can rest by the Boating Lake whilst Ben and Jemima play on the swings and slides. We can go rowing or fish for sticklebacks in the pond. It is an ideal place for flying kites and there is plenty of room to play ball games without any worry.
